author: pk910
content:
Yea, it's us ðŸ™‚ Distributing 10 ETH to ~9M addresses, so everyone that had some funds on holesky is getting a small drop on hoodi too.
It's about 190k transactions, with 50 transfers per tx. About 20 of them fit into a single block, so there's an average inclusion rate of 10 tx/block.
Will take about 2.6 days to clear up ðŸ™‚
Gasprice for those distribution txs is capped at 200 Gwei,  so it won't go higher than that.
